name: Sebastian Skubisz IT201 Sprint 03 Project
description: Continuing Off Sprint 02 Project I added 6 new features which include a Random Scale, Rotation, and color toggle.  I also connected keys 3 and 4 to turn ON/OFF the random color feature for user convenience. Aswell as an Clock animation toggle which is also controlled by a Key press 1 to turn ON the clock animation and press 2 to turn OFF the animation. Also added new animation prefabs to the existing dropdown to paint various animations provided.
